General.Name: Jianzhi Education Technology Group Company Limited American Depositary Shares
General.Description: Jianzhi Education Technology Group Company Limited develops and provides educational content products and IT services to higher education institutions in China. The company designs and develops customized IT system services. It also offers procurement and assembling services for equipment; digital content for vocational training; and educational resources and course content, as well as technological support and maintenance services. In addition, the company provides mobile media services, including mobile media advertising, mobile application content data business system, and Wo reading services. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: Tower A, Yingdu Building, Beijing, China, 100086
